Detailed Description

Creates a temporary file and unlinks or renames it on destruction.

Note: Should inherit from class File once that class is complete.

Definition at line 24 of file TempFile.h.

const MC2String &  tempPath,
const MC2String &  realFilename = MC2String(),
const MC2String &  realPath = MC2String()
) 
 

Creates a temp file with specific path and destination file.

Parameters:
tempPrefixFilename the filename that will have XXXXXX appended.
tempPath the path name for tempPrefixFilename.
realFilename the real filename the tempfile will be renamed to.
realPath the path name for realFilename.

Reposition file offset.

See also:
lseek(2)
Parameters:
offset offset in bytes from whence directive
whence One of the following SEEK_SET, SEEK_END, SEEK_CUR.
Returns:
offset in bytes from the begining of the file else -1 on failure with errno set.
